Blog.post: last night something bad happen to me,dun even know how to say... cant sleep,thinking about lots of stuff... This morning wake up with swollen eyes,went to sch ,my friend ask me what happen,i just told them i got sore eyes... ***************************************************************************************** can time really heal? really hope so..............

hmmmm..Hello people! this is my first entry!!! actually i had a diary at www.opendiary.com,but dun know why,its gone.. sad thing,inside there,there is alot of my past entry..kk,thats the pass,now i going to start a whole new diary.. OK! let start from friday which is erm.. 9/7/2004 Went to sch as usual,then lesson in class,and "RING RING RING RING" the bell rang,,sch dismiss! yeah!!!! then i run home... then my mum yesterday told me the TV man coming my house to repair my tv,k,then i wait at home,BASKET! the tv man vey lag then come! then he come liao,he on the tv,the tv can watch leh! surpirsing!! then ok lo,then he left,he never charge me any thing,so good..hahahha,k,then later i went out,got a date with someone! muhahahha cannot tell its who! *SHY* haha,went to taka with the someone ,and we eat seoul garden, we had alot of fun eating! muahhahahha! after that i send the someone home,reach home at around 1.05am then i very tired,went to sleep. 10/7/2004 *YAWN~* today wake up very late! Today wna to accompany my parent at home de,but never i expect they went out today! -.-" then my friend call me,ask if i wan to go pool with them at jurong east,then i agree lo,nothing to do also... reach there at 3.15pm then play for like 1 hour,we left liao,then we went to the jurong east bball court to play BALLS! wow! we play with those uncle! so pro! then we lost! muhahahah! after that went home at around erm,7+pm reach home my dad already home liao! then wanted to ask my dad to go dinner with me,then he say he eaten already,then i give this stupid face to him! then he see i like very pity,nothing to eat,call me to order something to eat! muhahahah! then i decide to order MAC! and in the i order canadian pizza! muahahah! then the pizza very fast come liao,i think around 30 min,then i eat 5 piece in one shot! then later at night i eat another piece! muhahahah,then went to bed with full stomach! wow! shiok!!!!!!! 11/7/2004 *yawn~* today wake up at 11.30am ... ayia! DAMN!!!!! i wake up late for my CARTOON! my FAV CARTOON! ARG!!!!!!! the cartoon very nice 1. its call "ONE PIECE" ayia,never mind,i d/l it online! then saw this sms from this someone,so sweet! muahhahahha !! then i rot the whole day at home! later going for training.. hmmmm,think its time to go perpare myself for training liao,or not i going to be late again..hahhahha sign off Dennis
